div.p: We make your child happy day after day

div.h4: COMPETENCE AND SELF ASSURANCE IN OUR STUDENTS

div.p: Our purpose is to prepare your child for a successful, happy life by helping them develop:

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-md vc_btn3-shape-round vc_btn3-style-outline vc_btn3-color-danger

div.class: vc_icon_element-inner vc_icon_element-color-custom vc_icon_element-have-style-inner vc_icon_element-size-ztl-lg vc_icon_element-style-rounded-outline vc_icon_element-outline vc_icon_element-background-color-custom

div.p: We create a warm, family-oriented campus. Our goal is to create a safe, loving environment where children can come together, creating, discovering, laughing, and developing their talents and their sense of community.

div.class: vc_icon_element-inner vc_icon_element-color-custom vc_icon_element-have-style-inner vc_icon_element-size-ztl-lg vc_icon_element-style-rounded-outline vc_icon_element-outline vc_icon_element-background-color-custom

div.h5: WE PREPARE YOUR KIDS FOR LIFE

div.p: We strive to prepare each child for life by ensuring a strong educational foundation, well developed communication and problem solving skills, and an awareness of responsibility that allows students to achieve competence and personal security as the foundation for happiness and success.

div.class: vc_icon_element-inner vc_icon_element-color-custom vc_icon_element-have-style-inner vc_icon_element-size-ztl-lg vc_icon_element-style-rounded-outline vc_icon_element-outline vc_icon_element-background-color-custom

div.p: Our staff provides a safe, positive, loving school to each student while encouraging critical thinking that fosters academic and social growth.

div.class: vc_icon_element-inner vc_icon_element-color-custom vc_icon_element-have-style-inner vc_icon_element-size-ztl-lg vc_icon_element-style-rounded-outline vc_icon_element-outline vc_icon_element-background-color-custom

div.p: Working in small groups increases success in learning

div.class: vc_icon_element-inner vc_icon_element-color-custom vc_icon_element-have-style-inner vc_icon_element-size-ztl-lg vc_icon_element-style-rounded-outline vc_icon_element-outline vc_icon_element-background-color-custom

div.p: Breakfast, morning snack, lunch, and after school snack provided free of charge.

div.class: vc_icon_element-inner vc_icon_element-color-custom vc_icon_element-have-style-inner vc_icon_element-size-ztl-lg vc_icon_element-style-rounded-outline vc_icon_element-outline vc_icon_element-background-color-custom

div.p: The Breakfast Club receives children from 7:30AM to 8:00AM and the Shazam After School Club receives children from 3:00PM to 5:30PM.
This institution is an equal opportunity provider.

aside.div: Midtown Primary School is a Public Charter School near the heart of Downtown Phoenix. We happily serve over 100 students from K thru 4th grade.
